subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Riley Skinner threw a 35-yard touchdown pass to Kenneth Moore in the fourth quarter to lead host Wake Forest past No. 21 Florida State, 24-21, last night.Skinner completed 19 of 27 passes for 215 yards and 2 touchdowns for the Demon Deacons (4-2, 3-1 Atlantic Coast Conference), who rallied in the second half to defeat the Seminoles (4-2, 1-2) in consecutive seasons for the first time in team history.Skinner led the Demon Deacons 82 yards in nine plays, converting three third downs in their winning drive.
